mapper.select: SELECT audit_log.*, appries_manager.realname, appries_dept.name deptname FROM audit_log left join appries_manager on audit_log.name=appries_manager.name LEFT JOIN appries_dept on appries_manager.deptid = appries_dept.id WHERE 1=1 ${ew.sqlSegment}

select t1.name,t2.realname,sum(case when logrst='成功' then 1 else 0 end) succtimes ,sum(case when logrst='成功' then 0 else 1 end) errortimes from audit_log t1 left join appries_manager t2 on t1.name=t2.name where logtype='登录' ${ew.sqlSegment} group by t1.name,t2.realname
